name: DHP_Union_Grey_Laptop_Tray_Futon
reviews: It looks just like the picture,and it's comfortable as a couch or bed. The arm rests are amazing for storage. The only negative is how short the cords are to plug it in.

I have a lot of pets and this hardly shows their fur at all - huge plus. Comfortable if you like firm; very firm cushion. Easy to change position. Like the length. Nice clean lines. The people who delivered it put it together in under 15 minutes
Great looking, very sturdy. The only issue is that I thought the layout sofa would be bigger - although they were the dimensions described in the description :).
description:
This grey futon provides all the conveniences of a futon plus the functionality of built-in USB ports and movable armrests so your can have technology within your reach. In three clicks, this futon converts from a sofa to a bed. With comfortable, durable linen and intuitive design, it is the perfect addition to your guest room or living room.
